# self

**Instance Property**

A bind target for the entity.

## Declaration

```swift
var `self`: BindTarget { get }
```

## Discussion

This property represents a bind path within an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationView] to redirect the view’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeSourceNode/source] animation to a different scene.

## Accessing a bind target

- **jointTransforms**: A bind target for the entity’s joint transforms.
- **transform**: A bind target for the entity’s transform.
- **parameter(_:)**: Provides a bind target for a particular animated property.
